name: De Ogen
description: De Ogen is a medium-sized undead creature characterized by its exceptional agility, hovering movement, and a haunting presence that renders foes incapacitated. Its skeletal frame offers little in physical strength, but it compensates with cunning and speed.
memorable: Can incapacitate creatures with its Transfixing Gaze and turn the slain into shadows, creating a continuous threat.
goals: To incapacitate and weaken its foes while avoiding direct confrontation.
relations: Often encountered alongside shadows or other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, abandoned areas or locations with minimal sunlight.
strengths: High Dexterity making it hard to hit, along with several immunities and resistances.
weaknesses: Very low Strength, making it ineffective in physical combats and sensitive to sunlight.
attacks: Burning Touch delivers fiery damage and can create shadows from slain foes.
most_powerful_ability: Transfixing Gaze can incapacitate opponents, rendering them defenseless.
skills: Boasts a proficiency in stealth, allowing it to remain undetected during maneuvers.
additional_information: Immunities to fire, necrotic, and poison damage.
Ability to move through objects and creatures with Incorporeal Movement.
Deals fire damage upon moving through spaces occupied by others or objects.
Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantage in bright light.
Humanoids slain by Burning Touch rise as shadows after 24 hours.
test_queries: undead that creates shadows from victims
